definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Flow property testing should be part of routine pre-engineering work, he says.
sentences.chinese: 流動性是日常先期工程工作的一部分，他說。

sentences.english: Some members of the delegation had arrived at an earlier date.
sentences.chinese: 代表團的部分成員已先期到達。

sentences.english: But Apple computers cost more upfront.
sentences.chinese: 但是，蘋果電腦的先期成本更高。

sentences.english: The Army has already started early planning on alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍已經啓動了替代方案的先期規劃。

sentences.english: This introductory rate period usually spans somewhere between 6 months and 1 year.
sentences.chinese: 這種先期利率週期經常持續大概6個月到1年之間。

sentences.english: Does the plater perform advanced quality planning?
sentences.chinese: 是否進行電鍍的先期質量策劃？

sentences.english: This project was devoted to the prior study on the II-VI compound semiconductor nano-optoelectronic devices.
sentences.chinese: 本計畫爲二六族化合物半導體奈米光電元件先期研究。

definition: to do sth in batches or groups
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
to intensify/to speed up/to step up
test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
